titleText: Views on Scottish Government's justice spending priorities
mainText: T.P.S. recently provided evidence to the Scottish Government's justice committee which was scrutinising the draft budget. Policy Officer, Faye, wanted to raise three particular points: that investment needs to be rebalanced; that we need to make better connections; and that the third sector are an asset to the criminal justice system. To read more about these three points you can read our full submission on www.turningpointscotland.com, and follow Faye on twitter at T.P.S. Policy.

We would like to extend our warmest thanks to Dorothy McElroy who completed her stint as Chair of T.P.S. last night, and also to Sheila Fazal who stood down from our board of directors. Thank you both for all your hard work.
